bibl.title: A Note on Two Thucydides Papyri (Pack2 1529).
bibl.note: P. Mich. III, 141 and P. Hamb. II, 164, both of the 2nd cent. A.D. and both containing VII, 36, 4-5, were written in different hands and represent two distinct writing styles.
bibl.seg: Wouters Alfons, A Note on Two Thucydides Papyri (Pack2 1529).
P. Mich. III, 141 and P. Hamb. II, 164, both of the 2nd cent. A.D. and both containing VII, 36, 4-5, were written in different hands and represent two distinct writing styles.
